Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='TRB02')

BibliographicData.Title: Parietal inputs to dorsal versus ventral premotor areas in the macaque monkey: evidence for largely segregated visuomotor pathways.
